keyBenefits.title: Continuous Support
keyBenefits.description: Your clients will always receive an answer, even outside working hours, which increases loyalty and service availability.

keyBenefits.title: Resource Savings
keyBenefits.description: Automating routine inquiries reduces the workload on live operators by up to 70%, allowing them to focus on complex tasks.

keyBenefits.title: Personalization
keyBenefits.description: AI remembers the history of each client's inquiries, offering relevant solutions and creating a sense of individual approach.

howItWorks: Integration: The bot easily integrates into Telegram, as well as other popular messengers and corporate chats where your clients and employees work.
NLP-analysis of requests: Uses advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) models to deeply understand the context and intent of the user in each message.
Knowledge Base: Connect your knowledge base (FAQ, documentation, product specifications, corporate rules), and the bot will instantly retrieve the necessary information from it for answers.
Lead Qualification: Asks clarifying questions to determine the client's needs, budget, and readiness to purchase, 'warming up' the lead for the sales manager.

Seamless Transfer: In case of complex, non-standard requests or at the client's request, the bot carefully transfers the dialogue to a live specialist, providing them with the full chat history and context of the problem.
useCases: Automatic answers to frequently asked questions about products, services, delivery terms, and payment.
Collection of primary data and qualification of potential clients before transferring them to sales managers.
Providing up-to-date order statuses or information on product availability.
First-line technical support for solving typical problems and consultations.
Customer service outside working hours and on weekends.

keyBenefits.title: Full Automation
keyBenefits.description: Eliminate manual processing of calls and messages for appointments, freeing up staff time.

keyBenefits.title: Reduced No-Shows
keyBenefits.description: Automatic reminders about upcoming appointments significantly reduce the number of missed bookings.

keyBenefits.title: Increased Occupancy
keyBenefits.description: A convenient and intuitive booking process, available 24/7, encourages clients to make appointments.

howItWorks: Calendar Integration: Synchronization with popular calendar services (Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar, Apple Calendar) and CRM systems for up-to-date display of available slots.
Intuitive Interface: Clients interact with the bot directly in Telegram, going through a simple step-by-step process of selecting a service, specialist, and convenient time.
Flexible Scheduling: Ability to configure different work schedules, breaks, weekends, and holidays for each specialist or resource.
Automatic Reminders: The bot sends personalized reminders to clients at a pre-set time (e.g., 24 hours and 1 hour before the meeting) to confirm the appointment.
Self-Service Appointment Management: Clients can easily reschedule or cancel their appointment via the bot, without needing to call or write, which is convenient for both parties.
useCases: Booking clients for beauty salons, barbershops, SPA salons, fitness centers.
Reserving tables in restaurants, co-working spaces, equipment rental.
Booking individual consultations with doctors, lawyers, psychologists, tutors.
Planning meetings with sales managers or product demonstrations.
Automatic organization of webinars, master classes, and group sessions.

keyBenefits.title: Service Improvement
keyBenefits.description: Quickly identify weaknesses in your business and promptly respond to negative feedback.

keyBenefits.title: Reputation Growth
keyBenefits.description: Automatically collect positive feedback and encourage its publication on external platforms.

keyBenefits.title: Deep Analytics
keyBenefits.description: Receive aggregated NPS (Net Promoter Score) reports and customer sentiment analysis automatically.

howItWorks: Automatic Triggers: The bot automatically sends feedback requests after predefined events (e.g., order completion, visit, project end, warranty expiration).

Flexible Survey Scenarios: Configure message chains depending on the client's rating. For a low rating, the bot delicately ascertains the reasons; for a high rating, it suggests leaving a review on public platforms.
Collection of Detailed Feedback: In addition to numerical ratings, the bot can collect text comments, photos, and videos, providing a complete picture of the customer experience.
Negative Management: Upon receiving a negative rating, the bot can automatically initiate contact with a manager for prompt problem resolution, preventing public negativity.
Reputation Management: Helps direct satisfied clients to platforms important for your reputation (Google My Business, Yandex.Maps, specialized review sites).
useCases: Assessing service quality in retail stores, cafes, restaurants, hotels.
Collecting feedback after completing online courses, trainings, webinars.
Monitoring customer satisfaction in service centers, car services.
Continuous collection of opinions on new products or features.
Automated reputation management across all key online platforms.

keyBenefits.title: Error Reduction
keyBenefits.description: Minimizing human error and increasing the accuracy of inventory accounting.

keyBenefits.title: Inventory Optimization
keyBenefits.description: Accurate knowledge of balances and expiration dates prevents losses and surpluses.

keyBenefits.title: Time Savings
keyBenefits.description: Automating routine and labor-intensive inventory tasks.

howItWorks: Computer Vision: Uses advanced machine vision algorithms to analyze video streams from ordinary cameras (smartphone, stationary IP cameras).
Automatic Recognition: AI can recognize goods by their appearance, barcodes, QR codes, logos, and even packaging shape.
OCR Expiration Dates: A specialized Optical Character Recognition (OCR) module reads production and expiration dates on product packaging.

Synchronization with ERP/WMS: The obtained data on the quantity and status of goods are automatically synchronized with your inventory accounting system (ERP, WMS, 1C), ensuring the relevance of information.

Forecast and Auto-Order: Based on the analysis of current balances, sales speed, and expiration dates, AI can generate recommendations for replenishing stocks or automatically form draft orders to suppliers.
useCases: Fast and accurate inventory of goods in warehouses, retail stores, pharmacies.
Monitoring product freshness in supermarkets, restaurants, cafes.
Accounting for equipment, tools, and components in production or rental companies.
Monitoring product availability on store shelves to prevent empty spaces.
Automated quality control of incoming goods.
